review: I used to be extremely fearful of dental procedures, but my experience at Dr. Mayuri‚Äôs Clinic has completely transformed my perspective. I recently underwent a root canal treatment, and to my surprise, it was both painless and satisfying. Dr. Mayuri and her team‚Äôs method of thoroughly explaining every step of the process, coupled with her serene and composed demeanour during the treatment, is truly commendable. tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,Doctor friendliness,
review:
I had recently undergone a surgery at ToothFix Dental Clinic for the removal of my wisdom tooth which was horizontal with almost the whole tooth under the surface of the gum.

It was a complicated surgery since it was very close to the nerve. Dr Mayuri successfully performed the surgery taking utmost care and with a lot of patience to ensure that the nerve is not bruised during the procedure. Even during the surgery she made sure that I am comfortable at each stage.

I am very thankful to Dr. Mayuri for having solved the issue of my impacted wisdom tooth which was giving me a lot of trouble for a long time.

Hi Merin ,
We‚Äôre so happy that your visit at Toothfix Dental Clinic went so smooth.

Cheers,
Toothfix Dental Clinic

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Dental Fillings,Ceramic Crowns and Bridges Fixing,
review:
While on a short trip to Mumbai, I was forced to see a dentist due to a bad toothache. Dr. Mayuri and the RCT specialist on her team did a thorough check up and explained that 2 of my teeth needed RCT (incl. a wisdom tooth). 

Within 6 days (including 2 public holidays), they coordinated and worked together to ensure the RCT on both teeth were done and the ceramic crowns were ordered & delivered in time. I am very happy with the entire experience and outcome - the ceramic crowns are of high quality and the RCT treatment has thus far been very effective.
reply_text: Hey , Thank you for your kind words. We are delighted to hear that you had a great experience at Toothfix Dentofacial Clinic. Feedback like this helps us constantly motivate us and improve our patient experiences by knowing what we are doing right and what we can work on. So, we appreciate you taking the time to send us this helpful response. Appreciate your patience and cooperation during the treatment procedure. It was a great pleasure serving you. Do not hesitate to visit or call if you have any Dental/Oral health concerns. Thank you once again for the visit. Cheers, Toothfix Dentofacial Clinic
